titles.title: To extend the authority to establish a commemorative work on Federal land in the District of Columbia and its environs to honor Brigadier General Francis Marion and his service.
To extend the authority to establish a commemorative work on Federal land in the District of Columbia and its environs to honor Brigadier General Francis Marion and his service.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: Extends through May 8, 2018, the authority provided by the Consolidated Natural Resources Act of 2008 for the establishment of a commemorative work on federal land in the District of Columbia to honor Brigadier General Francis Marion and his service during the Revolutionary War.
